name: Semester Break
description:
Semester Break is a horror game inspired by the urban legend and a the game Slender Man. In the game, the player takes on the role of a college student who decides to spend their semester break in their hometown but unfortunately, during his journey he crashed his car and woke up in a secluded cabin in the woods. However, as the time pass, strange occurrences start happening and the player begins to realize that they are not alone. The game is set in a first-person perspective and features a dark and eerie atmosphere. The player must explore the cabin and surrounding woods, gathering clues and items that will help them uncover the truth behind the mysterious events. As the player progresses through the game, the tension and horror escalate, leading to a terrifying conclusion. The game features challenging puzzles and intense stealth gameplay, as the player tries to evade monsters and survive out of the cabin. Overall, Semester Break is a thrilling and intense horror game that is sure to keep players on the edge of their seats.

Ps: Just a short game completed as an assignment for a university course in 2 weeks time. I will not be updating the game anymore :p
